channel.title: Running Server FTW
channel.description:
I have gotten my server to compile and stuff successfully, But when i click "Run server" and then open MoparScape and type my No-IP in it doesn't work... Help pl0x?
Oh and do i just keep it running when it says "Starting TestScape server on 0.0.0.0:43594?

item.title: Running Server FTW
item.dc:creator: @bburton31 bburton31
item.description:
@bburton31 wrote:

do you have the no-ip DUC program??? because finds your ip for you so you cant go wrong. And yep what lil_0mfgorz said, you must keep the program in the background you can minimise it, JUST DO NOT CLOSE IT!!! Also if you are having tones of trouble with no-ip i suggest himachi, check the tuts, and a bonus of himachi is it causes less lagg as you connect in a LAN. But, it’s your choice and i have to say no-ip is more popular.

Also:
Have you downloaded Sever Tutorial V3? THat contains all the files you need no-ip, himachi and tones of well old sources lol, tell me if you haven’t got it and if not i’ll try and find you link. Hey, it helped me!

Read full topic

item.title: Running Server FTW
item.dc:creator: @lil_0mfgorz lil_0mfgorz
item.description:
@lil_0mfgorz wrote:

yes keep it running if you close that you will shut down your server

Read full topic
